title: New York Attorney General Targets Mislabeled Herbal Supplements
teaser: Four major retailers including Wal-Mart, Target, GNC and Walgreens are accused of selling mislabeled herbal supplements in New York. DNA tests by the state attorney general's office found that some store brand supplements do not contain the ingredients as advertised.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
